name: reserve-a-seat-for-the-talks-and-attend-a-workshop--cristina-chambers;issue-jira-6-browser-chrome-context-chrome-feature-02-register-registrationto-the-conference-capability-features-02-register-theme-features
title: Reserve a seat for the talks and attend a workshop (Cristina Chambers)

testSteps.description: Given that Cristina Chambers gets access to the ticket reservation page

children.description: Cristina Chambers visits the conference page
Cristina Chambers opens the browser at "/"
Cristina Chambers maximises the browser window
Cristina Chambers wants to register
Cristina Chambers clicks on the Register button

testSteps.description: When he buys a quantity of 3 vip tickets for the talks

children.description: Cristina Chambers buys a quantity of 3 vip tickets for the talks
Cristina Chambers buys a quantity of 3 tickets of type vip
Cristina Chambers clicks on the Talks tab
Cristina Chambers enters 3 into the Number of Vip Tickets field

testSteps.description: And he buys a quantity of 3 tickets for the workshop Workshop A

children.description: Cristina Chambers buys a quantity of 3 for the workshop Workshop A
Cristina Chambers buys a quantity of 3 tickets of type Workshop A
Cristina Chambers clicks on the Workshops tab
Cristina Chambers enters 3 into the Number of Workshop A Tickets field

testSteps.description: And he fills the registration form with his personal info: Cristina Chambers, maryellenSalas, maryellensalas@elemantra.com, 03/10/1986, NIXELT, 290 Hausman Street - Wikieup - Northern Mariana Islands - 1026, Catharine, 57478, Cyprus

children.description: Cristina Chambers fills the registration form with his Cristina Chambers, maryellenSalas, maryellensalas@elemantra.com, 03/10/1986, NIXELT, 290 Hausman Street - Wikieup - Northern Mariana Islands - 1026, Catharine, 57478, Cyprus
Cristina Chambers scrolls to the Continue button of the tickets section
Cristina Chambers clicks on the Continue button of the tickets section
Cristina Chambers enters Cristina Chambers into the Actor's Fullname
Cristina Chambers enters maryellenSalas into the Actor's Nickname
Cristina Chambers enters maryellensalas@elemantra.com into the Actor's Email
Cristina Chambers picks the date 3/10/1986 on the Actor's Date of Birth
Cristina Chambers enters NIXELT into the Actor's Company
Cristina Chambers enters 290 Hausman Street - Wikieup - Northern Mariana Islands - 1026 into the Actor's Address
Cristina Chambers enters Catharine into the Actor's City
Cristina Chambers enters 57478 into the Actor's Zip
Cristina Chambers selects "Cyprus" from the Actor's Country
Cristina Chambers clicks on the Continue button of the registration form

testSteps.description: Then he sees the message 'Thank you to have been registered to the AT conference'

children.description: Cristina Chambers checks the text of the Thanking message for the registration
